src:
Zvezda rutinski do nove pobede, Garsiji prija „Karađorđe“
02 Nov 2019, 17:50 by Darko
Proleter – Crvena zvezda 0:2(0:0)Garsija 59′, Boaći 82′
Fudbaleri Crvene zvezde su rutinski osvojili nova tri boda pošto su u 15. kolu Linglong Super lige Srbije na stadionu „Karađorđe“ savladali Proleter. Novosađani su dobro parirali šampionu u prvih 45 minuta, ali su crveno-beli u nastavku dodali gas i golovima Garsije i Boaćija stigli do pobede.
Proleter: Petrić – Tanasin, Leandro, Andrejević, Kovačević – Jovanović (Rušević od 73′), Pejić – Šćepanović (Novaković od 64′), Babić, Marjanović (Jovanović od 84′) – Mirosavljev.
Crvena zvezda: Borjan – Gajić, Pankov, Milunović, Rodić – Vulić (Jovančić od 62′), Kanjas – Garsija, Marin, Simić (Boaći od 62′) – Pavkov (Jevtović od 81′).
U prvom poluvremenu nije bilo mnogo zanimiljivih detalja. Prvi je zapretio Proleter, u 18. minutu kada je Jovanović volej udarcem sa 20 metara probudio Borjana. Zvezda je uglavnom pretila preko Pavkova, koji je u propustio tri prilike, najbolju u 30. minutu, kada je njegov udarac glavom odbranio golman Petrić. To je ujedno bio i jedini šut u okvir gola u prvih 45 minuta.
Mogao je Proleter do vođstva u 36. minutu, posle dobre akcije. Babić se našao u idealnoj poziciji, ali je Milunović fantastično izblokirao njegov udarac.
U nastavku je Zvezda zaigrala mnogo agresivnije. Igralo se pred golom domaćina i to se isplatilo u 59. minutu. Simić je pobegao po levoj strani, pronašao Garsiju na petercu, a Argentinac u padu zatresao mrežu. Garsija je bio strelac na „Karađorđu“ i krajem avgusta, kada je spektakularnim golom doneo pobedu Zvezdi protiv Vojvodine.



Crveno-beli su posle vođstva umirili igru, a Proleter osim pokušaja Andrejevića i Pejića, nije mogao ozbiljnije da ugrozi Borjana.
U finišu utakmice Vladanu Milojeviću su se isplatile izmene. U 82. minutu, tek što je ušao u igru, Jevtović je prošao po levoj strani, asistirao još jednom „rezervisti“ Boaćiju kojem nije bilo teško da poveća na 2:0.
Proleter je mogao do počasnog gola u 88. minutu, kada je odbrana Zvezde zaboravila na Leandra, ali je Brazilac sa pet metara neometan, šutirao pored gola.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Star routinely to new victory, Garcia favors "Karadjordje"
02 Nov 2019, 16:50 by Darko
Proleter - Red Star 0: 2 (0: 0) Garcia 59 ′, Boaci 82 ′
The Red Star football players routinely scored three more points after beating Proleter in the 15th round of the Linglong Super League of Serbia at Karadjordje Stadium. The newcomers parried the champion well in the first 45 minutes, but the red and white continued to add gas and Garcia and Boaci's goals came to victory.
Proleter: Petric - Tanasin, Leandro, Andrejevic, Kovacevic - Jovanovic (Rusevic of 73 ′), Pejic - Scepanovic (Novakovic of 64 ′), Babic, Marjanovic (Jovanovic of 84 ′) - Mirosavljev.
Red Star: Borjan - Gajic, Pankov, Milunovic, Rodic - Vulic (62 'Jovancic), Kanjas - Garcia, Marin, Simic (62' Boats) - Pavkov (81 'Jevtovic).
There were not many interesting details in the first half. The first was threatened by Proleter in the 18th minute when Jovanovic volley woke Borjan with a shot from 20 yards. The star mostly threatened through Pavkov, who missed three chances, the best in the 30th minute, when his header was defended by goalkeeper Petric. It was also the only shot at goal in the first 45 minutes.
Proleter could have taken the lead in the 36th minute, after good action. Babic was in the ideal position, but Milunovic fantastic block his shot.
In the sequel, the Star played much more aggressively. The game was played in front of the home side and it paid off in the 59th minute. Simic escaped to the left, finding Garcia on the top five, and the Argentine in the fall shook the net. Garcia was a scorer on Karadjordje and in late August, when he scored a spectacular goal with a spectacular victory for Zvezda against Vojvodina.



The Red and Whites calm the game after the lead, and Proleter, apart from Andrejevic and Pejic's attempts, could not have seriously threatened Borjan.
Vladan Milojevic's game finishes paid off for the changes. In the 82nd minute, just as he entered the game, Jevtovic went on the left side, assisting once again the "reservists" to Boaci who was not difficult to increase to 2-0.
Proleter could have scored an honorable goal in the 88th minute, when the Star defense forgot about Leander, but the Brazilian, from five meters unobstructed, shot past the goal.
